name: SEVA Foundation Trust
briefDescription: SEVA Foundation Trust is a Non-Governmental Rajkot-based Organization Registration No. E/9367/Rajkot, open to all citizens and not affiliated to any political party. SEVA Foundation seeks issue-based support from the public and networks with other like-minded NGOs to lend force to issues that the SEVA takes up. The SEVA Foundation largely comprises of professionals, social workers, retired officers and civil servants, etc. who do not have any political affiliation.the SEVA Foundation Trust. It projects the following keywords: Strength,Care,Enviorment,Health,Justice and Pressure, with reference to “active pressure” as one of the main tenets behind the SEVA Foundation Trust,to promote & advocate RTI as the most effective tool to promote accountability & to use the same as &   when require
